metadata.Title: CVE-2018-20153 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
In WordPress before 4.9.9 and 5.x before 5.0.1, contributors could modify new comments made by users with greater privileges, possibly causing XSS.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-20153` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

wordpress - 5.0.1+dfsg1-1
wordpress-l10n - 5.0.1+dfsg1-1
wordpress-theme-twentytwenty - 5.0.1+dfsg1-1
wordpress-theme-twentytwentyone - 5.0.1+dfsg1-1
wordpress-theme-twentytwentytwo - 5.0.1+dfsg1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: wordpress package in kinetic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.0.1+dfsg1-1').
